duties_responsibilities.duty: Work with existing sales accounts and pursue potential new customers in a specific geographic region
Increase share and penetrate new markets/applications with the company's products
Maintain a healthy pipeline of opportunities with a focus on revenue potential and closure velocity
Complete Quarterly Business Reviews (QBRs) as assigned by management
Proactively work with Distribution focusing on training, joint target account efforts, National Corporate programs, and miscellaneous sales needs
Prepare annual sales forecasts, market potential, and district plan as required by Sales management
Keep supervisor informed on key activities and actions in the marketplace that may impact the business
Controlled and effective use of expenses through planning and efficient coverage of District and accounts
Follow company's Ethics and Safety Programs, State and Federal Environmental Compliance Programs, and Export, Import and Supply Chain Security Policy requirements

education_certification.credential: 4 Years of Outside Sales Experience (Industrial Sales Preferred)
